use_case.title: Digital Biomarker Validation Strategy (DiMe V3 Framework)
use_case.summary: Prompt-driven, DiMe V3-aligned workflow to verify, analytically validate, and clinically validate digital biomarkers derived from wearables, sensors, or apps for regulatory acceptance and clinical utility.
use_case.indication: Generic — framework applicable to any digital biomarker
regulatory_references: FDA Digital Health Innovation Action Plan (2017)
FDA Guidance: Clinical Decision Support Software (2019)

workflows.name: Digital Biomarker Validation Workflow (V1–V3)
workflows.description: Nine-step process covering intended-use definition, V1 verification, V2 analytical validation, V3 clinical validation, and regulatory submission preparation.

rag_sources.title: FDA Draft Guidance on Real-World Data (2021)

tasks.title: Define Intended Use & Context of Use
tasks.objective: Clarify digital biomarker’s construct, population, endpoint type, and regulatory pathway.

prompts.name: Intended_Use_Definition
prompts.system_prompt: You are a DTx Chief Medical Officer defining the Intended Use and Context of Use for a digital biomarker.
prompts.user_template: Draft Intended Use statement and determine validation level (V1/V2/V3) for {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Design Verification Study (V1)
tasks.objective: Plan accuracy, precision, and data-quality testing against gold standard comparators.

prompts.name: Verification_Study_Design
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Data Scientist designing a digital biomarker verification protocol.
prompts.user_template: Define comparator, sample size, and ICC/Bland-Altman criteria for {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Execute Verification & Analysis
tasks.objective: Conduct data collection and statistical analyses (ICC, Bland-Altman, correlation).

prompts.name: Verification_Data_Analysis
prompts.system_prompt: You are analyzing digital vs. gold-standard data for verification.
prompts.user_template: Compute ICC, bias, limits of agreement, and data-quality metrics for {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Design Analytical Validation Study (V2)
tasks.objective: Plan construct, convergent, and divergent validity analyses.

prompts.name: Analytical_Validation_Design
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Clinical Research Scientist designing analytical validation.
prompts.user_template: Define study objectives, comparators, sample size, and validity metrics for {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Execute Analytical Validation
tasks.objective: Collect data and evaluate reliability and validity statistics.

prompts.name: Analytical_Validation_Execution
prompts.system_prompt: You are executing analytical validation analyses.
prompts.user_template: Report construct validity, convergent/divergent correlations, and reliability (α, ICC) for {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Design Clinical Validation Study (V3)
tasks.objective: Plan prospective study linking biomarker to clinical outcomes and treatment response.

prompts.name: Clinical_Validation_Design
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Clinical Scientist designing clinical validation for a digital biomarker.
prompts.user_template: Define outcomes, statistical plan, and MCID methods to test clinical relevance of {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Execute Clinical Validation & MCID Determination
tasks.objective: Conduct clinical validation study and determine MCID using anchor- and distribution-based methods.

prompts.name: Clinical_Validation_Analysis
prompts.system_prompt: You are analyzing clinical validation data.
prompts.user_template: Assess correlation with outcomes (p<0.05) and compute MCID via anchor- and distribution-based methods for {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Regulatory Strategy & FDA Pre-Submission
tasks.objective: Prepare and submit FDA Pre-Submission package summarizing validation results.

prompts.name: Regulatory_PreSub_Plan
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Regulatory Director preparing an FDA Pre-Submission for a validated digital biomarker.
prompts.user_template: Draft Pre-Sub questions on validation sufficiency, comparator adequacy, and endpoint acceptability.

tasks.title: Validation Report & Publication
tasks.objective: Consolidate all validation evidence into final report and peer-reviewed manuscript.

prompts.name: Validation_Report_Publication
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Medical Writer compiling the final digital biomarker validation report.
prompts.user_template: Summarize V1-V3 methods and results per DiMe V3 Framework and draft manuscript for submission.

links.note: Digital biomarker must align with endpoint strategy from UC-01.
Validated biomarker feeds into RCT Design workflow.

risk_register.title: Poor agreement with gold standard during V1
risk_register.mitigation: Pilot test; refine algorithm before full V1.

risk_register.title: Unclear FDA precedent for novel biomarker
risk_register.mitigation: Early Pre-Sub meeting with FDA; cite analogous precedents (e.g., EndeavorRx).

risk_register.title: Algorithm update post-validation invalidates results
risk_register.mitigation: Version lock algorithm for trial duration; re-validate after updates.
